name: Villa Silas
address: Jl. Raya Tebongkang Gg. Tapan, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: The rooms were very clean, the view was great. The floating breakfast in the pool was very enjoyable. I reached everywhere by motorbike in a very short time, it is centrally located
review 2: Amazing place. Great location surrounded by rice fields. Room was spacious and had everything we needed in it. Breakfast was so goood! Pool lit up at night is beautiful
review 3: Gorgeous guest house with rice fields view. Rooms are big and spacious with so much day light, breakfasts are very delicious. Very convenient location, close to center Ubud and Monkey forest, many coffee shops nearby
review 4: Amazing experience here, from the food to the peace that this space provide! All the staff is very helpfull and kind. Recommend this place 100%!
review 5:
I really wanted to like this place. The beds are comfortable, the view is nice and the staff is super kind and helpful. I stayed in two different rooms. I changed from the first one as the mouldy smell was too much and everything was incredibly dirty.

They didn‚Äôt have time to clean as I checked in early, fair enough. But after a night I needed to change room. The smell improved but there are many defects on the wall that they‚Äôve painted over. Bathroom lamp did not work. Tv didn‚Äôt work in the first room. The new room was still dirty ending in black feet after walking in the room. I ended up sweeping the floor myself and baby wiped the surfaces of cupboards, door handles etc, all the wipes ending up black from the dirt coming off.

I don‚Äôt know if there‚Äôs an issue with cleaning standards or if the equipment is dirty itself. The staff are super kind though.

name: Bali Family Hangout
address: Jl. Katik Lantang, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Great place. Our 2.5 year old loves it.  We‚Äôve come here a lot during our Ubud visit and work as he plays.  It‚Äôs a really nice vibe.

They also have activities everyday that the kids can participate in for extra tokens ‚Äî these are different everyday.  We‚Äôve also left him in day care for 1/2 day and taken swim lessons.

Their food is also pretty good and their staff is very attentive. The playground itself is covered so they can play even when it rains.
review 2:
This place is a GODSEND! It has the most epic playground, the coolest pool and toddler room. I get to just kick it and drink a coconut and eat awesome food while my daughter plays. I have been DREAMING of a place like this while in Bali!!!!!
If you want to have a date night while you have the kids this is the place to go!! The staff are soooo nice and the food is awesome . Can not recommend enough!!
review 3:
Our son loves this place! There are so many things for him to play with and climb on and there‚Äôs a cute restaurant with food and drinks so parents can hang out and eat or work. They have a kids club, a huge playground, a trampoline, a pool where they offer swim lessons and they have movies on weekends!
Highly recommend this place!
review 4: The playground is awesome for toddlers. However, we just wanted to stop in and let our toddler have a quick play and grab some refreshments. The price-tag for our toddler to play being 150K was very expensive. Sure, it‚Äôs valid for the day, but we were just popping in. Maybe a pricing model per hour would be a good option.
review 5: Visiting from USA and found this super fun play area for kids and relaxing spot for adults! The frozen mojito mocktail is delicious. I also highly recommend their Best Beef Burger, it‚Äôs mouth watering good. Easily one of the best burgers I‚Äôve had.The only thing I wish this place had is a few more additional toys and etc for the kids! Very fun playground and play area though, and very clean.

name: Cheeky Monkey Cafe
address: Jl. Katik Lantang, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Very nice place for families. The place is new, clean. The games area is very funny and there is a nice pool as well. Food is very good with big portions. Staff is very friendly. Just the price which for me is too expensive. 100 k would have been perfect.
review 2:
Today my daughter & I visited the Cheeky Monkey Cafe and WOW is the first words that came to mind.
This is a parents dream, to release there children in safe, interactive, play area - which was massive! Plus they had a pool there, so don‚Äôt forget to bring you bathers.
The food choices was amazing and everything was delicious üòã
As soon as you enter, there is someone who greets you and opens the safety gate to welcome you into the cafe. Which put my mind at ease knowing that my daughter couldn‚Äôt wonder off.
There are interactive activities on everyday. Today was face painting, learning how to make Traditional Balinese Offerings and Mini Mixologist (Strawberry drink) - just purchase a token for $10,000RP ($1AUD) per activity.

Zahra had the Hot Diggity Dog (Hot Dog) and it was so creative, how it was presented.
I had the ‚ÄúBoost you Immune‚Äù Juice and the Curry Chicken Wrap, with a side of fries - 10/10 üòã

This is such an awesome space for the digital nomad parents to work from and watch their kids play.
Such a wonderful family friendly space, which is extremely safe and they have staff cleaning regularly.

All the staff are friendly and very helpful. I highly recommend visiting this place for a date night, while your child go off to play.
There are heaps of events for parents and children.
Plus you can host parties there - winning!!

Go check out their instagram page and there full menu! All of the kids food is shaped to an animal or sea creature.
review 3: This has to be the worst restaurant in Ubud. I was excited to try it out. Oh my how dissatisfied I was. The space is really attractive but that‚Äôs it. We were 7 and All of us had a poor meal. Whoever designed the menu and portions needs to be replaced. I had the pumpkin salad. There were 4 pieces of pumpkins the size of my pinky. The lettuce portion was the size of my fist. No value. Truly an Ubud rip off.
review 4:
We come here all the time to work so our son can play in the play area. Great atmosphere. The food is pretty good and reasonably priced.

Their kids menu is good portions. They have chicken nuggets, fries, hot dogs, pizza. Basically all the kids food.

We usually sit back with a coconut and get the uluwatu bowl (tastes like chocolate ice cream), salads and cappuccinos.

We love supporting this place. It‚Äôs one of the few places in ubud specifically designed for children.
review 5: We love this place! Great food, great ambiance and there‚Äôs a playground so our son can be entertained while we relax. There‚Äôs so much for him to play with and climb on, they also have a trampoline and a pool where they teach swim lessons too. The owner, Tammie, is so sweet and will give lots of recommendations for the area and places to go. Highly recommend this place!

name: The Sowan Ubud
address: Jalan Katik Lantang Penesanan, F6JX+QXJ, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Had a really lovely two night stay. Quiet but close enough to fantastic Ubud restaurants, cafes etc. Staff very friendly and helpful. Organised scooter hire and taxi service- very attentive. Thanks
review 2:
The place is clean and suitable for group of family or friends. We have stayed one night and truly enjoy our time.
Pros
1. The room is spacious and clean. AC working perfectly
2. The bathroom is huge and has bathtub which really convince for us whose traveling with kids.
3. The access to the villa is easy, due the location is really close to ubud center.
4. Their extra bed is massive, the size is 160x200 which really comfy.

Cons
1. Lacking in amenities,
2. No TV
3. The kitchen has lots of utensil, however they forgot to put the pan which really essential.

Overall compare to the budget we spent, the experience is worth. We believe that the property could be a huge success in the future.
review 3: Lovely place and super friendly staff, we could also hire a scooter on the spot. Chezzy was very helpful with everything we wanted to know. Room was immaculate condition and prices very affordable. I would recommend having breakfast at the hotel than going out (if you want to save some money of course) it was delicious and cheap.
review 4:
People are excellent and friendly. Place is clean and comfortable as expected. Breakfast is awesome. I'd stay here again.

They had to charge me 5% extra for credit cards, that was a turn down. Pool is much smaller than it appears in the pics. I'd avoid any services inside. Rentals, laundry, water everything is marked up 300% from what you can find nearby.
review 5:
Comfort place to stay with your family.
The staff very friendly, their pool was clean enough, they have few option for breakfast (soto and bubur kacang ijo)
There's two things for note, at the time we come, their water heater was not working, hope that they fix the heater immediately.
And if you bring car to this place, their parking lot quite small, so be careful when park your car.

name: Rumma Lanna - Ubud Villa by Hombali.com
address: Gg. Tapan, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
We loooooved this place!
We called it the rice paddies penthouse.
It‚Äôs perfect to work from home. The office view is so beautiful!

The beds are really good quality. The personal who assists you is really nice and professional.

The kitchen it‚Äôs practical and well equipped. Of course it doesn‚Äôt have everything, but we lived here almost 2 month and we can‚Äôt complain.

We have a beautiful time in here, I highly recommend it if you are considering it.

It‚Äôs a little bit far away from Ubud, but if you rent a motorbike it‚Äôs perfect! More quiet than staying in the middle of the town.
review 2: A beautiful property located  in the middle of the rice field. It was quite peaceful and relaxing, exactly the way we intended our vacation to be. The place looks just like the pictures. The manager, Juni and Pranata were super helpful and went above and beyond to ensure our stay was memorable.
review 3:
Amazing villa just in 7min from Ubud üòç
The view is breathtaking: sunsets and sunrises in Rice fields...  the villa is clean and comfortable for family. We enjoyed our holidays. Thank you to accommodate us
review 4: Highly recommend Villa Tulsi! My girlfriend and I stayed there for 3 months last year ‚Äì it was great. We looked at many places in Ubud and Villa Tulsi was an easy pick (although, rarely available... I guess we got lucky with our timing!) Juni is great! üòä
review 5: It's a perfect place for short escape from a busy city because it's surrounded by rice fields. But not too far from Ubud center as well. Strategic.

name: Alke Villas Ubud
address: F6GX+W6P, Singakerta, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
The owner of Alke Villas sold us this place as a perfect villa for long term rental fully equipped and quiet. This was NOT the case. The Villa is located just behind a small farm which makes it impossible to enjoy anytime day and especially not the night. There are many dogs barking all night non stop and the roosters and pigs also don't stop making noise. Also the main water pump is directly behind the master bedroom which is obviously broken or crap as it goes on and off every 2 mins and is very loud. We got no sleep. When we arrived at the villa there was also hardly enough equipment for a long stay, only 1 set of sheets on the bed, no towels and not even enough spoon or suitable fridge for long term. The drinking water dispenser was filled with algae and made us sick the first days. We had to buy a new one ourselves as the staff was unapologetic and not willing to do anything about it. We spent a week organising his staff to get this stuff for us and at the end still had to buy extra things to make the stay bearable. In addition to these issues, the pool was always dirty, with algae growing in it and always at the bottom of the pool. The staff couldn't seem to fix this and no one took us seriously. The quality of the cleaning was bad, often always having to tell them what to do. The water in the taps smelt like rotten eggs or dead animals and was horrible to shower or wash in.
We left the villa for a few days and when coming back we see that the staff had broken in and taken the drinks and food from our fridge and consumed them!!!!
From the beginning we were trying to contact the owner to help us and he was NOT interested in us. After we handed over the money, that was it! We ended up leaving the villa as sleep deprived and RIPPED OFF. We contacted the owner many times to try and reason with him and got no leniency, not even a small partial refund for the hassle and extra cost and time. This guy knows nothing about customer service or being a host. Even looking at his other online reviews for his other Villas around Ubud, it's clear we are not the first ones who's had problems. AVOID!

name: Wayan jirna house
address: Banjar Tebongkang, gang Tapan No.Blok 4, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Fantastic place with super kind and friendly host. We have stayed for more than 1 month here and enjoyed every single day!

Highly recommend!
review 2:
Wayan & his family were so polite and kind.
We stayed for a month.
So far this was the best long stay we ever had !!
review 3: I stayed 5 months at Wayan house. I love my room in the corner. It was clean and enough bright, with large windows. Everyday best sunrises at 6 a.m. Wayan and his family was kind and friendly. Wayan always want to do best for his guests. Highly recommend to stay this house for short and long period.
review 4:
Amazing place , wonderful people
If you are looking for an authentic Balinese experience away from the mass tourism then book time here , if you can because often fully booked .

name: Rumah Tomi Listiani
address: F6HX+MMP, Singakerta, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: ODDING VILLA
address: Jl. Raya Tebongkang, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Villa Rona
address: F6MX+JFM, Jl. Katik Lantang, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Sadly the bathroom had green moss and black mold, no replacement toilet paper in a week, cleaning only 3 times, never had floor mopped. I can't understand this as we were out all afternoon each day.
Pool was lovely and bed very comfortable, owners were friendly the few times we saw them, but way overpriced and previous over generous reviews led to expectations being far from met. All in all, very very disappointing.
review 2: Me and my wife stayed here for our honeymoon in Bali and it was amazing. The couple that own the Villa are so lovely and did everything they could to make our stay the best ever. Would love to go back.
review 3: Absolutely great service. The couple running the place are super friendly and help with everything. The included breakfast was 10/10. Can highly recommend villa Rona
review 4: Amazing place, nice hosts, excellent food in the Warung. And a breathtaking view to the rice fields from your gate.
review 5: This villa is very comfortable and clean, perfect for families or couples. we are very satisfied with the service. thank you very much for wayan

name: DE ANGGA 2
address: Jl. Raya Tebongkang No.39, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Putra Bali best tour
address: F6HR+5W8, Sayan, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Mimpi House
address: Unnamed Road, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Stayed there for several months, the owner and his family are pure gold ‚ù§Ô∏è
The house is a couple of minutes away from the main road but the view and surroundings are extremely beautiful, wake up in the morning with a smile on your face!

name: The Nugraha Villa Ubud
address: Gg. Tapan, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: This is a beautiful place to stay near yoga and close to the city but away from noise and hustle. Everything is in walking distance. The pool is fantastic for a swim. The owners are always kind and helpful with everything you need.
review 2: I really enjoy to stay here, this villa is surrounded by rice fields and it is very quiet, the room is very clean and the interior is unique, lovely place to stay and enjoy my weekend. Everything was just perfect, such a recommended villa!üòç
review 3: Im from india and this is the second i stay here, I really" recomend to stay here because this place have a  nice view, safe, and also quite place!!!
review 4: Clean, kind and amazing facility. I really recommend to stay hereü§©

name: Umah Tapan
address: F6HV+4CX, Gg. Tapan, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Villa Frangipani Indah
address: Jl. Raya Tebongkang No.39, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Lovely villa just outside Ubud

My family and I enjoyed a lovely two week vacation in August 2015. Conveniently located just outside Ubud, our stay was peaceful and relaxing. The villa is beautifully designed and equipped with all the conveniences of home. The manager and onsite staff were always available and worked hard to meet our requests. They also provided a reasonably priced driver who we used daily to get around Ubud and who ferried us back and forth from the airport. My children enjoyed playing and flying kites in the surrounding rice fields. Walking distance from the terrific restaurant Oman's Warung. We look forward to returning to the villa the next time we visit Bali.

name: Villa Luar
address: F6HX+MMP, Singakerta, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Radin Bali Trekking
address: Singakerta, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
It was just pure luck for me to find them ‚Äì I saw a poster of their tours somewhere on social media and texted them about prices.

I booked the Mt Batur sunrise trekking and was then offered a few other places to visit without any extra transportation cost as we were driving past them anyway.

I was picked up from my accommodation and shared a van with three other people, so there was plenty of space for everyone. The hike was amazing, our guide was friendly, helpful and very considerate with everyone (he also organized transportation during the hike for some who didn‚Äôt feel well and couldn‚Äôt proceed with the hike). We got plenty of time on top to enjoy the sunrise and hiked slowly back down.

After that, I got a personal driver who took me to the hot springs, the coffee plantation and the rice fields where he waited an hour at all the places until I was done. I loved all the visits and really recommend these for everyone!

After the amazing tour, I was dropped off back to my accommodation and couldn‚Äôt believe that I got to see and experience so much in half a day!
review 2: We had an amazing experience with Radin and his team during our Mount Batur Trek. Radin took care of all the arrangements, including comfortable transportation to and from the trek. Throughout the journey, Siska, one of Radin's staff members, served as our guide. She was incredibly helpful, attentive, and supported us every step of the way. Radin himself personally drove us to and from Mount Batur, which added a personal touch to the whole experience. This was our first trek, and thanks to Radin and Siska, it was an unforgettable one. I highly recommend their services to anyone looking for an awesome trekking experience.
review 3: Wayan is fantastic. Organises everything from being picked up early hours to being dropped back off and everything in between. This was the second climb up Mount Batur with him and different friends. Will soon be going up Mount Agung with Wayan as well for another awesome climb! Wayan also has a drone and GoPro which if you ask, he‚Äôll provide some fantastic footage. 100% recommended.
review 4:
One of the worst companies i have ever come across.
Wrongly market as english speaking guides when none of them can do so.
Dropped us almost 3 kms from where the trek actually starts, guide left us mid way.

It was thanks to the other lovely guide whom we came across who helped us in coming back down safely
review 5: We had a great experience in the Mount Batur Jeep Sunrise Tour. The pickup was on time, and we were taken to the sunrise spot before dawn. The driver was very friendly and polite, he even took some nice photos and videos for us.

name: Villa Casa Lokke
address: Jl. Raya Tebongkang Gang Casa Lokke, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
We stayed for 4 days, we had the best experience and no problem at all,
the staffs are very friendly and cooked us breakfast every morning and cleaned the villa, so when we came back after a long day exploring Bali the rooms are super clean. We're so happy and we'll come back for sure thank you!
review 2: Had the best experience here. Amazing location, extremely friendly staff and stunning villa. Would love to come back one day! 5 of us stayed here and it was perfect, we had breakfast every morning and the staff helped us to book our excursions and even sorted our transport each day we needed it ‚ù§Ô∏è
review 3:
I‚Äôd give it 1 star; but the staff are sweet hearts. Mold inhalation all week, bathroom does not come with complimentary shower-soap/shampoo. Towels feel like hardened sandpaper. The bathroom is damp and thick with mold; my lungs and throat burn after a week of breathing this mold-spore-air all week.

Tidak bagus for me
review 4: Very nice and enjoying our holiday

name: Kemangi Apartments and Yoga Space
address: F7J2+P2J, Jl. Katik Lantang, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
